objectives_of_pre_qualification_intervie.3: Gather information about the candidate's background and motivations
objectives_of_pre_qualification_intervie.4: Clarify questions and address specific circumstances
objectives_of_pre_qualification_intervie.5: Provide information about the Developers Institute program
objectives_of_pre_qualification_intervie.7: Highlight the unique aspects and offerings of the program
objectives_of_pre_qualification_intervie.8: Emphasize the benefits of joining Developers Institute

pre_call_actions.1: Read or review the answers from the candidate's application form
pre_call_actions.2: Check the candidate's LinkedIn profile and connect with them

discovery_call_questions.1: Introduce yourself and inquire about the candidate's well-being
discovery_call_questions.2: Ask the candidate to share a bit about themselves
discovery_call_questions.3: Present the DI program and inquire about the candidate's professional and academic background, coding knowledge, and reasons for wanting to study code
discovery_call_questions.5: Address specific circumstances such as immigration status or unemployment duration
discovery_call_questions.6: Inquire about the candidate's preferred bootcamp and start date

bootcamp_program_explanation.1: Explain the bootcamp programs offered by DI
bootcamp_program_explanation.2: Detail the methodology and structure of the bootcamps, including full-time and part-time options, schedule, and support provided
bootcamp_program_explanation.3: Highlight the practical, hands-on nature of the bootcamps and the expertise of the instructors
bootcamp_program_explanation.4: Explain the internship opportunity and its benefits
bootcamp_program_explanation.5: Describe the career coaching provided after the bootcamp
bootcamp_program_explanation.6: Differentiate Developers Institute from other training programs and emphasize its focus on student success
bootcamp_program_explanation.7: Present exclusive offers such as unlimited boot camps, access to learning platforms, and Slack community membership
bootcamp_program_explanation.8: Highlight the additional mindset classes offered
